about_the_game:
Hellborn is a co-op horror experience where you and your friends must face pure evil. A priest's misguided ritual has unleashed a demonic force that has possessed his wife and the restless spirit of their unborn child. Now, trapped in the ruins of a cursed monastery, you and the other bums must work together to uncover the truth behind the ritual, evade the vengeful entities that lurk in the shadows, and find a way to escape before you become part of the nightmare.

Survive the Ritual. Exorcise the Demon. Escape Damnation.

  • Online Co-Op – Team up with up to 4 players to perform dark rituals and survive the horror.

  • Dynamic Haunting – The banshee hunts you relentlessly, growing more aggressive as you disrupt the ritual.

  • The Ghost Plane – If you die, you must navigate the spectral realm, evading the demon baby and reaching the altar before you're dragged to hell.

  • Sacrifices & Strategy – Perform sacrifices, gather cursed relics, and weaken the demon before attempting the final exorcism.

  • Terrifying Atmosphere – Immerse yourself in a nightmarish setting filled with unsettling sounds, grotesque visuals, and unpredictable encounters.

The ritual has begun. The demon stirs. Will you break the curse, or will Hell claim you all?
detailed_description:
🔥 HELLBORN EARLY ACCESS – JOIN THE RITUAL NOW! 🔥

The gates of hell have opened, and the nightmare begins. Get ready for an intense co-op horror experience where teamwork, strategy, and courage are your only hope for survival.

👻 Early Access Features Include:
✅ Online Co-Op (1-4 Players) – Face the terror together.
✅ Dynamic Haunting – The banshee evolves, becoming more aggressive.
✅ Ghost Plane Mechanics – Die and fight your way back to the living.
✅ Sacrifices & Rituals – Perform dark rites to weaken the demon.
✅ Unpredictable Horror – No two playthroughs are the same.

📢 Join our Discord and shape the future of Hellborn!

Dare to enter? The ritual awaits.
